title: Makes provisions regarding the denial of applications for licenses and learner's permits
summary: Requires the state to deny the application for a driver's license or permit of any person convicted of any violation resulting from the operation of a motor vehicle in another state where such violation, if committed within the state, would have resulted in a suspension or revocation of such person's New York state driving privileges.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the denial of applications for licenses and learner's permits
